flawed_nl_solution:
Hillary needs to read for 1 hour which equals 60 minutes.
Hillary has read for a total of 16 minutes + 28 = <<16+28=44>>44 minutes so far.
Hillary will need to read for 60 minutes - 44 = <<60-44=61>>61 minutes on Sunday.
#### 61

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 61. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
